= Submitting Issues =

*Before submitting any issues, please [http://code.google.com/p/queueman/issues/advsearch search existing] issues.*

== How to Submit an Issue ==

Please follow these steps to submit a new ticket;
  * [http://code.google.com/p/queueman/issues/entry Start a new Issue] 
  * Choose template type (Enhancement, Defect, etc)
  * Enter descriptive summary
  * Provide details listed in template.

= Voting for Issues =

"+1" etc is *not required*. Simply star the ticket to increase its rank.

[http://code.google.com/p/queueman/issues/list Browse all issues]


= Ticket Reports =
If you just want to [http://code.google.com/p/queueman/issues/grid see a ticket grid] that may be interesting.
